title: Stay Vista
description: Stay Vista is a web application that helps users find the best accommodations in various locations. It features a search engine, booking system, and a user-friendly interface.
highlights: Responsive design optimized for all devices
Interactive carousel for showcasing property images
Intuitive UI with a focus on user experience
additionalFeatures: Dark mode toggle for better accessibility
Faster page loads with optimized assets
Backend API integration for dynamic content

title: Tech Bridge
description: Tech Bridge is a platform connecting technology enthusiasts with resources and projects. It features forums, project collaboration tools, and technical blogs.
highlights: Rich technical blog with real-world solutions

title: Code Wizard
description: Code Wizard helps developers with syntax guides, templates, and code snippets to enhance productivity and learning.

title: Travel Guru
description: Travel Guru is a travel planning web application that helps users create and manage itineraries with recommendations for accommodations and activities.
